title: Love Your Enemies
content: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you, that you may be children of your Father in heaven.

title: Blessed Are the Peacemakers
content: Blessed are the peacemakers, for they will be called children of God. Blessed are those who are persecuted because of righteousness, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

title: The Greatest Commandment
content: 'Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind.' This is the first and greatest commandment. And the second is like it: 'Love your neighbor as yourself.' All the Law and the Prophets hang on these two commandments.

title: Forgive Seventy-Seven Times
content: Then Peter came to Jesus and asked, 'Lord, how many times shall I forgive my brother or sister who sins against me? Up to seven times?' Jesus answered, 'I tell you, not seven times, but seventy-seven times.'

title: The Beatitudes - Blessed are the Poor in Spirit
content: Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

title: The Beatitudes - Blessed are Those Who Mourn
content: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

title: The Beatitudes - Blessed are the Peacemakers
content: Blessed are the peacemakers, for they will be called children of God.

title: The New Commandment
content: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.

title: The Greatest Commandments
content: Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind. This is the first and greatest commandment. And the second is like it: Love your neighbor as yourself.

title: On Forgiveness
content: If you forgive other people when they sin against you, your heavenly Father will also forgive you. But if you do not forgive others their sins, your Father will not forgive your sins.

title: The Way, Truth, and Life
content: I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.

title: Come to Me for Rest
content: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you and learn from me, for I am gentle and humble in heart, and you will find rest for your souls. For my yoke is easy and my burden is light.

title: Love Your Neighbor
content: The second is this: 'Love your neighbor as yourself.' There is no commandment greater than these.

title: Love One Another
content: My command is this: Love each other as I have loved you.

title: The Lord's Prayer
content: Our Father in heaven, hallowed be your name, your kingdom come, your will be done, on earth as it is in heaven. Give us today our daily bread. And forgive us our debts, as we also have forgiven our debtors. And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from the evil one.

title: God's Love for the World
content: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

title: Love Your Enemies
content: You have heard that it was said, 'Love your neighbor and hate your enemy.' But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

title: The Golden Rule
content: Therefore, in everything, do to others what you would have them do to you, for this sums up the Law and the Prophets.

title: The Good Shepherd
content: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep. I know my sheep and my sheep know me.
